Class MaterialSceneElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.scene.SceneElementDecorator

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bounded3, SceneElement, VisibilityFunction3, Serializable

    public final class MaterialSceneElement
extends ModifierSceneElement
    A decorator SceneElement that applies a Material to the underlying SceneElement.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
    See Also:
    Material, Serialized Form
